claim: A viewer of Monday Night Football would be able to catch WWE Raw during commercial breaks.

supporting.text: Monday Night Football and WWE Raw are both broadcast on Monday nights, often overlapping in their time slots, making it possible for a viewer to switch channels during commercial breaks.

attacks.text: Monday Night Football and WWE Raw are both broadcast on Monday nights, often overlapping in their time slots, making it possible for a viewer to switch channels during commercial breaks.
Commercial breaks for Monday Night Football and WWE Raw may not align, reducing the likelihood of seamless channel switching.
Broadcast schedules are often published in advance, allowing viewers to check for overlapping commercial breaks.
Viewers may not have access to both channels simultaneously, especially if they are on different cable packages or streaming services.
Many modern TVs and streaming devices allow for quick channel switching or picture-in-picture viewing, mitigating the issue of channel access.
The cognitive load of switching between two fast-paced programs may make it difficult for viewers to follow both effectively.

supporting.text: Commercial breaks in live sports broadcasts like Monday Night Football are frequent and predictable, providing ample opportunities for viewers to briefly switch to WWE Raw.

attacks.text: Commercial breaks in live sports broadcasts like Monday Night Football are frequent and predictable, providing ample opportunities for viewers to briefly switch to WWE Raw.
Monday Night Football and WWE Raw often air simultaneously, making it impossible to watch both live at the same time.
Many viewers use DVR or streaming services to watch WWE Raw later, reducing the need to switch during commercial breaks.
Commercial breaks in Monday Night Football are not always long enough to fully engage with WWE Raw content.
Some viewers may prefer to stay engaged with football analysis or commentary during commercial breaks rather than switching channels.

supporting.text: Both Monday Night Football and WWE Raw are popular live events, and networks often schedule them to avoid direct competition, allowing viewers to catch parts of both.

attacks.text: Both Monday Night Football and WWE Raw are popular live events, and networks often schedule them to avoid direct competition, allowing viewers to catch parts of both.
Monday Night Football and WWE Raw often air on different networks, making it impossible to switch between them during commercial breaks without changing channels.
Many cable and satellite providers offer picture-in-picture or multi-view features, allowing viewers to watch both events simultaneously.
Commercial breaks in live sports like Monday Night Football are often shorter and less predictable than scheduled breaks in WWE Raw, making it difficult to sync viewing.
DVR and streaming services allow viewers to pause and rewind live TV, enabling them to catch both events at their convenience.

supporting.text: Modern TV guides and streaming services make it easy for viewers to quickly switch between channels or streams, facilitating the ability to catch WWE Raw during Monday Night Football commercials.

attacks.text: Modern TV guides and streaming services make it easy for viewers to quickly switch between channels or streams, facilitating the ability to catch WWE Raw during Monday Night Football commercials.
Many viewers may not have access to multiple streaming services or channels simultaneously due to subscription limitations or technical constraints.
Some streaming platforms offer multi-view or picture-in-picture features, allowing viewers to watch multiple streams at once without switching.
The timing of WWE Raw and Monday Night Football commercials may not align perfectly, making it difficult to catch significant portions of WWE Raw during breaks.
DVR or on-demand services allow viewers to pause or delay one program, enabling them to watch WWE Raw during Monday Night Football breaks without missing content.

supporting.text: Many sports fans are also wrestling fans, and networks are aware of this overlap, often structuring commercial breaks to retain viewership across both programs.

attacks.text: Many sports fans are also wrestling fans, and networks are aware of this overlap, often structuring commercial breaks to retain viewership across both programs.
Commercial breaks during Monday Night Football are typically short and standardized, leaving insufficient time to switch to WWE Raw and back.
Networks prioritize ad revenue over viewership retention, making it unlikely they would structure breaks specifically for WWE Raw.
Some viewers may use DVR or streaming services to watch WWE Raw later, reducing the need to catch it during commercial breaks.
WWE Raw and Monday Night Football often air on different networks, making simultaneous viewership impractical.
Cable packages often bundle sports and entertainment channels, making it easier for viewers to switch between WWE Raw and Monday Night Football.
